content.text:
# Draft:List of awards and nominations received by V (Kim Taehyung)

Kim Tae-hyung, widely known as V of BTS, has achieved remarkable success with his solo endeavors, earning numerous prestigious nominations and awards. His debut solo album, "Layover," released in 2023, garnered significant acclaim, leading to his nomination for the 'Favorite Debut Album' at the 2024 iHeartRadio Music Awards, where he emerged victorious. At the 2024 Korea Grand Music Awards, V was honored with the "Trend of the Year – K-pop Solo" award, underscoring his influence as a solo artist. Additionally, his single "FRI(END)S" received a nomination for Best Pop Video – International' at the 2024 UK Music Video Awards, further highlighting his global appeal. These accolades reflect V's successful transition from group to solo performances, solidifying his position in the global music industry.
